name: My Lovely Daughter
summary:
How far will you go to bring back your loved one?

My Lovely Daughter tells a story about a grieving father and his intense love of his late daughter. As an alchemist, players will assume the role of Faust and have to raise varieties of homunculus to help growing the soul to revive his daughter. The game emphasizes on players building relationship with their homunculus, just to sacrifice them for his daughter.

As a simulation game, My Lovely Daughter borrows elements from other works of fiction that involve alchemy as part of the narrative. The game wants to focus on the idea that “life is not beautiful,” and the few things that can make it pretty are things like family and success. It also aims to present the question of how far will you go to achieve them.
